comment._content: Thank you for sharing the photos of these wonderful people...

comment.author: 56093383@N06
comment._content: Holy geez, my grandmother Hilda Gross Levinson (of blessed memory) is in here! I did a Google search and found this! How amazing. Thanks for sharing! I'm sort of our family historian and I've never seen this photo, only heard her stories.
